app_name: Groups Control Groups Streaming Apps Bravo Live Stream TV Shows
app_description: Watch all of your favorite Bravo shows straight from the Bravo app! Stream full episodes and live TV from The Real Housewives Below Deck Vanderpump Rules Project Runway Million Dollar Listing AND MUCH MORE. Watch the most recent episodes of your favorite shows or watch live TV with the Bravo app. Catch up with live TV and past seasons anytime anywhere! Live stream TV from your phone or tablet and catch up on the latest seasons of your favorite shows. Get started by signing in with your TV provider cable satellite or digital . The Bravo app supports most TV providers including DirecTV Xfinity Spectrum AT T and Verizon. Sign up for an NBCUniversal Profile within the app using your Google Apple ID or email account and receive three credits to watch shows for free before signing in with your TV provider. Live stream your favorite shows and sync them across all your devices to continue watching right where you left off. Watch now to catch the latest episodes of your favorite shows on the Bravo app today! BRAVO APP FEATURES: Watch Bravo Shows Stream full episodes of your favorite Bravo shows. Watch episodes of The Real Housewives of Potomac and The Real Housewives of Salt Lake City Live stream your favorite shows like Below Deck Watch What Happens Live and so much more! Stream Episodes Your Way Watch episodes of new Bravo shows the day after they air on TV. Watch shows by signing in with your TV provider and access the entire catalog of VOD and live content. Live stream TV and access schedule 24 7. Chromecast and AirPlay compatible! Start episodes in the app and stream to your TV. TV on the go! If you can t finish an episode in one sitting the Bravo app saves your place so you can resume watching later. Watch TV and mark shows as your Favorites for quick access to the latest episodes. NBCUniversal Content Watch NBC shows on demand from the NBCUniversal family of networks including NBC E! USA SYFY Oxygen MSNBC CNBC Universal Kids Universo and Telemundo . Live stream NBCUniversal networks within the app. Watch shows and filter by network and genre while browsing. NBCUniversal Profile Create an NBCUniversal Profile to save shows across all your devices. Live stream your favorite shows and continue where you left off on any device. Watch shows for FREE with three credits when you sign up! COMMENTS OR QUESTIONS Please reach out to iOS nbcuapps.zendesk.com for assistance. Please note: Use of the app is limited to the United States and its territories. Video is accessible via 3G 4G LTE and Wi Fi networks. Data charges may apply.
